```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

library(googlesheets4)

```

Each month we have a new and interesting talk and discussion by an early-career diabetes researher.

We regularly update the calendar.

```{r reading-google-sheet, echo=FALSE}

GDJC_calendar_2021 <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UyNK6WxiKiGgvylb-WyF22r51iTMk47rUdjtEo_wG_A/edit?usp=sharing")

GDJC_calendar_2021 %>% 
  knitr::kable()


```
